spaska.statistics

Class ClustererStatistics

  • java.lang.Object
    • spaska.statistics.Statistics
      • spaska.statistics.ClustererStatistics

  • public final class ClustererStatistics
extends Statistics
    A simple statistics for clusterization algorithms.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ClustererStatistics(int[] clusters)
      Construct a statistic object by an array which contains the numbers of instances per each cluster.

      • generateInfo

        protected void generateInfo()
        Description copied from class: Statistics
        Generate the statistics output string. This should be called by subclasses to generate meaningful statistics information.
        Specified by:
        generateInfo in class Statistics

      • setClassNames

        Set class names for current instances.
        Parameters:
